name: KARTHIK BIBIREDDY
headline: Sr. Software Engineer | Distributed Systems & Scalable Infrastructure | Technical Leader
professionalSummary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of building and scaling distributed systems, high-throughput APIs, and data-intensive applications across Amazon and multiple startups. Recognized for driving cross-team technical initiatives, influencing system architectures, and mentoring engineers to deliver resilient and scalable solutions. Passionate about solving complex systems challenges, leading org-wide improvements, and aligning engineering execution with long-term business strategy.

workExperience.title: Sr. Software Development Engineer
description: Influenced leadership to adopt generative AI on AWS Bedrock by delivering an event-driven investigation assistant. Designed and led multi-agent, DAG-orchestrated workflows that query reverse-indexed knowledge bases and auto-update tickets via SOP-driven actions, boosting on-call efficiency by 50% and enabling org-wide extensibility.
Led migration of Amazon’s reference pricing platform across AWS regions (DUB → ZAZ), eliminating single-region dependency and achieving 40% of org-wide infrastructure cost reduction goals.
Increased global pricing accuracy by excluding 600K+ daily targetedpromotional orders from computations, improving reference prices for 400K+ product listings across the retail catalog.
Revamped external pricing signal ingestion by defining SLAs and onboarding higher-quality sources, increasing adoption by 320 bps across multiple pricing teams.
Mentored and directed an intern to build a self-service debugging tool for reference pricing; adopted org-wide, reducing on-call and support workload by 25%.
Drove a structured tech debt reduction program that decreased backlog by 20%, introducing new grooming and sprint planning practices aligned across stakeholders.
Launched Alexa Auto’s teachable AI feature, enabling custom voice commands; drove 25% adoption within four weeks across early-access customers.
Delivered production-grade messaging and contact management services (Quattro) for Stellantis vehicles, leading middleware optimization and Alexa integration used by millions of drivers.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Architected and deployed scalable computer vision services for real-time face tracking and AR-based virtual try-on experiences across devices.
Partnered with ML research teams to analyze CV algorithms, driving improvements in model accuracy, latency, and deployment efficiency.
Accelerated inference performance using WebAssembly, ensuring stable experience across devices with limited compute and memory.
Owned cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, and DevOps pipelines, introducing cloud-native practices and improving team deployment velocity.
Worked directly with enterprise customers to translate requirements into production-ready integrations, strengthening adoption and retention.

workExperience.title: Software Engineer
description: Led development of aerospace ground control station software, including geolocation 3D mapping and real-time aircraft tracking with ASDB integration.
Designed and delivered Primary Flight Display (PFD) systems enabling reliable in-flight monitoring and decision-making under real-time constraints.
Contributed to scaling of open-source avionics project (Airliner) by building APIs, developer tools, and modularized multi-window ground station UI.
Established rigorous QA practices through peer reviews, automated testing, and field validation during outdoor flight trials.

workExperience.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed NLP-powered news aggregation widget using topic modeling and keyword extraction, deployed on McDermott’s corporate homepage.
Engineered enterprise-facing applications leveraging open-source NLP libraries for finance and energy customers.
Maintained and supported large-scale ingestion pipelines processing millions of global data sources for Zdaly’s enterprise data platform.

projects.title: Technical Analysis Platform for Financial Markets
description: Building a personal platform to backtest and analyze trading strategies using historical financial data, with event-driven AWS Lambda workflows, ETL pipelines for sentiment and technical analysis, and a React-based dashboard for strategy evaluation and performance tracking.

projects.title: Real Estate Investment Analysis Tool
description: Developed a web-based tool to evaluate real estate investment opportunities by comparing buying vs renting, incorporating inputs like purchase price, interest rate, taxes, and ownership costs to output projected ROI, breakeven points, and overall investment value in a clean, user-friendly interface.
